saao/saa15/P334861
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}UTU-re-ʾu-u₂-a lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ša LUGAL be-li₂ ina UGU {LU₂}ARAD-šu₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a {1}ak-ka-da-a.a ina UGU x x it-tah-ra-an-ni ma-a x x x e-gir₂-tu₂ ša de-ni-šu₂ x x x x x ma-a ina pa-ni-ka x x x x x ke-e-tu-u₂ šu₂-nu x x x x x de-e-ni an-ni-u₂ x x x x x-tu₂ {1}{d}PA-kil-an-ni x x x x x x-ʾu u₂-piš-u-ni x x x x x e-gir₂-te-šu₂ o
